title: Bauma 2010 logo font ID (Bauhaus: yes... but not quite)
content:
Hello:

I'm cracking my head over this "2010" numbers...

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20110519072040im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Bauma2010_4519.jpg)

No problem on the "bauma" text, the numbers are the unknown ones, tried Bauhaus and Gill Sans but nothing...

Any ideas?

Q™ Says: It's all about the fonts...
author: Qdzign.com.mx

comments.content:
Hi:

Me again... Yeah, I know what you're thinking, maybe Blippo, but it's too bold, is there any other thinner version of it?

Q™ Says: It's All About The Fonts!

Well, well...

I guess I better go with Virginia Bold...

Thanks!

Q™ Says: It's All About The Fonts!

[Pump Demi](http://web.archive.org/web/20110519072040/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/letraset/pump/) is pretty close. Maybe just a bit of white stroke to thin it a little.

- Mike Yanega

Thanks Mike!! As always, you're the man...

Q™ Says: It's All About The Fonts!
